text: In design manager click on the settings button in the bottom right.
He’s asking for the wrapped text to be indented so it stays inline with the first line rather than just the option for text wrapping

Correct Matthew!

Matt, look at how the second line of line 3 wraps to the far left? What I'm asking for is for it to wrap and start where the beginning of that line is indented to.

It would be great if HS had a toggle in the forms for hiding the labels in an accessible friendly way.

Designers always design their forms like this:
<https://spin.d.pr/R9xxmh+>

I tell them a million times over it’s bad practice to hide the labels makes it hard to make them stay screen reader friendly and provides a worse experience for users who have sight because they can’t see the label once they click/type in the field.

In the mean-time here’s my own solution
